name: PIPE MANAGER
description:
PIPE MANAGER IS A GAME WHERE YOU NEED TO MANAGE DEPOSITS OF WATER. IF ANY OF THEM FILLS YOU LOSE, GOOD LUCK.

Controls: click on the green part on the containers of water to move the water from a deposit to another, but be careful, you are just using a pipe so it won't suck the water it will only equalize it. If you connect the first deposit to the river, you can drain the water out into the river so you don't have to worry about it. Do not let the water overflow and good luck.
